name: Cabayanos
body:
# Cabayanos Island

## Cabayanos is inspired of [Tenedos](http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Tenedos)island 
Cabayanos (16.3 km2) is smaller than Tenedos (42.63 km2).
While the sattelite map, elevation and roads are based on the real thing, I've taken a lot of liberties to produce some interesting locations for Arma3. 

## Why another island for arma 3 ?
Well, i've got an other project on the road to create a Multiplayer & Single player campaign for this island

## Work
I got a lot of things to do :
* Rework the satmap to be more real
* Fixe some "comete" rock on the air
* Create template for towns
* Rework the underwater ground

## When this island will release?
I don't really i got an other work, i already spent more than 150 hours on Cabayanos. 
But dont worry you will be warn via armaholic and Bi forum.

## Here is some WIP pictures
![Satelite map WIP](http://img11.hostingpics.net/pics/5731832015020700001.jpg)
![Maybe a trailer soon?](http://img11.hostingpics.net/pics/3062942015021100001.jpg)
